'''Wake of Earth''' is [[Traveler (Geo)]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* There are 4 instances of Shockwave DMG.
* The [[Geo Constructs]] created do not contribute to the 3 construct limit.
* {{TalentNote|icd|Initial Shockwave DMG}}
* {{TalentNote|icd|Final Shockwave DMG|0}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{TalentNote|constellation|1|Invincible Stonewall}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|3|Will of the Rock}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|4|Reaction Force}}
* {{TalentNote|constellation|6|Everlasting Boulder|The stone wall from this talent lasts 5 seconds longer for a total of 20 seconds.}}
